00038 #include "strtol10.h"

00056 bool strtoul10(const char *first, const char *last, unsigned long *val)
00057 {
00058     // Check for no input
00059     if (*first == '\0')
00060         return false;
00061 
00062     *val = 0;
00063     for(/*nop*/; first != last && *first != '\0'; ++first)
00064     {
00065         if ((*first < '0') || (*first > '9'))
00066             return false;
00067 
00068         *val = (*val * 10L) + (*first - '0');
00069     }
00070 
00071     return true;
00072 }
00073

00080 bool strtol10(const char *first, const char *last, long *val)
00081 {
00082     bool negative = false;
00083 
00084     if (*first == '+')
00085         ++first; /* skip unary plus sign */
00086     else if (*first == '-')
00087     {
00088         negative = true;
00089         ++first;
00090     }
00091 
00092     bool result = strtoul10(first, last, (unsigned long *)val);
00093 
00094     if (negative)
00095         *val = - *val;
00096 
00097     return result;
00098 }
